item.title: 飞利浦 66 首席执行官预计明年全球炼油短缺
item.description: 美国第二大炼油商菲利普斯 66 计划明年的炼油市场将 "具有建设性"，因为燃料制造能力不足，无法满足全球需求。【原文：Phillips 66, the No. 2 US oil refiner, is planning for a “constructive” refining market next year with a shortage of fuel-making capacity available to meet global demand.】

item.title: 阿拉巴马州医院因支出飙升而拖欠 6000 万美元债务
item.description: 阿拉巴马州首府蒙哥马利市一家拥有 344 张床位的医院拖欠了 6000 万美元的市政债券，未能满足债券持有人受托人提出的立即偿还债务的要求。【原文：A 344-bed hospital in Alabama’s capital, Montgomery, defaulted on $60 million of municipal bonds, failing to meet a bondholder trustee’s demand for immediate repayment of the debt.】

item.title: 拜登破灭收购希望，美国钢铁交易传言不攻自破
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp. ）的股价与其日本竞争对手 140 亿美元的收购计划之间的差距急剧扩大，交易员们纷纷抛售股票，因为他们担心该交易会在美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）的反对下破裂。【原文：The gap between United States Steel Corp.’s stock price and a $14 billion proposed takeover by its Japanese rival exploded as traders ditched shares amid fears the deal collapse under opposition from President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 利率期权显示美联储本月降息半点的押注上升
item.description: 利率期权交易商加大了赌注，认为美联储将在本月启动宽松周期，降息半个百分点，这反映出人们越来越多地猜测决策者将采取积极行动，以防止经济下滑。【原文：Rate options traders stepped up wagers that the Federal Reserve will kick off its easing cycle with a half-percentage-point cut this month, reflecting the increasing speculation that policymakers will act aggressively to keep the economy from sputtering.】

item.title: 迈阿密圣瑞吉公寓项目获得 5.27 亿美元融资
item.description: 南佛罗里达开发商 Related Group 和 Integra Investments 获得了一笔 5.27 亿美元的贷款，用于在迈阿密建造豪华公寓。【原文：South Florida developers Related Group and Integra Investments landed a $527 million loan to build luxury condos in Miami.】

item.title: 生物技术公司首次公开募股希望渺茫，但已做好上市准备
item.description: 在经历了一连串乏善可陈的交易之后，生物技术行业正期待着四家有望在未来几周内首次定价出售股票的新公司，看看它们能否重振该行业。【原文：After a string of lackluster deals, the biotech industry is looking to four debutants expected to price first-time share sales in the coming weeks to see if they can reignite the sector.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司 HPS 已开始与潜在投资者讨论 IPO 事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，2016 年从摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：HPS Investment Partners, the private credit manager carved out of JPMorgan Chase & Co. in 2016, has begun discussing an initial public offering with potential investors, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 布林肯前往海地，安全部队打击黑帮
item.description: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）将于本周前往海地，讨论这个饱受暴力蹂躏的加勒比国家的最终政治过渡问题，因为一支国际安全部队正在与肆虐首都太子港的犯罪团伙作斗争。【原文：US Secretary of State Antony Blinken will travel to Haiti this week to discuss an eventual political transition for the violence-plagued Caribbean nation as an international security force is confronting criminal gangs that overran the capital Port-au-Prince.】

item.title: 罗伯-阿诺特推出由股指废品组成的 ETF
item.description: 新旧交替。【原文：Out with the new, in with the old.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促南非新政府实施大胆改革
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，南非新的多党政府应实施大胆改革，以充分发挥经济潜力。【原文：South Africa’s new multiparty government should implement bold reforms to achieve the economy’s full potential, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: 拜登将阻止新日铁收购美国钢铁公司的提议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国总统乔-拜登正准备阻止新日本钢铁公司以 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司。【原文：US President Joe Biden is preparing to block Nippon Steel Corp.’s $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 桑迪-斯普林与顾问合作洽谈出售事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在美国大西洋中部开展业务的小型银行 Sandy Spring Bancorp Inc.【原文：Sandy Spring Bancorp Inc., a small bank with operations in the mid-Atlantic US, has been working with financial advisers as it considers takeover talks with potential buyers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 如果就业数据疲软，高盛的鲁布纳认为可能会出现修正
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The stock market could be heading for correction if payrolls data comes in weak on Friday, according to Scott Rubner, managing director for global markets and tactical specialist at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 意大利获得欧盟批准，将利润丰厚的海滩许可证延长至 2027 年
item.description: 意大利已与欧盟达成协议，将利润丰厚的海滩特许经营许可证延长至 2027 年，这是继罗马与布鲁塞尔在此问题上数十年冲突之后的最新一次延迟。【原文：Italy has reached an agreement with the European Union to extend lucrative licenses for beach concessions until 2027, the latest delay following decades of clash between Rome and Brussels on the issue.】

item.title: 罢工期限临近，加航为飞行员加薪 30
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，加拿大航空公司已提出在未来三年内将 5000 多名飞行员的工资提高约 30%，以防止发生罢工。【原文：Air Canada has offered to boost the pay of more than 5,000 pilots by about 30% within the next three years, according to people familiar with the matter, as it seeks to prevent a strike.】

item.title: 德意志银行聘用花旗集团 TMT 交易员 Dadgar 推进并购业务
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）已聘请花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Deutsche Bank AG has hired Peyman Dadgar, a managing director at Citigroup Inc., to lead its telecom, media and technology investment banking coverage in Europe, Middle East and Africa.】

item.title: 俄罗斯周通胀率 18 个月来首次出现负值
item.description: 俄罗斯央行在 7 月底将关键利率上调至 18%后，俄罗斯的周通胀率自去年 2 月以来首次出现负值。【原文：Russia’s weekly inflation entered negative territory for the first time since February last year after the central bank raised its key rate to 18% in late July.】

item.title: 据说 DSV 在全球国际货运竞标中提出限制裁员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，DSV A/S 已承诺限制德国铁路股份公司物流部门的裁员人数，此举是为了使该部门的竞购战向丹麦公司倾斜。【原文：DSV A/S has committed to limit layoffs at Deutsche Bahn AG’s logistics arm in a move to tilt the bidding war for the unit toward the Danish company, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿波罗计划建立私人信用贷款交易平台
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is planning to build out a secondary trading desk for private debt provided by a handful of lenders, according to people with knowledge of the matter who asked not to be identified as the details are private.】

item.title: 市政债券市场的巨额交易热潮没有停止的迹象
item.description: 今年的市政债券销售额已创下历史新高，而超大型交易（超过 10 亿美元的交易）的步伐也几乎没有放缓的迹象。【原文：It’s already a record-setting year for muni-bond sales, and the relentless pace of mega-deals — those over $1 billion — is displaying little signs of slowing.】

item.title: 代表称欧佩克+接近推迟增加石油供应
item.description: 在需求脆弱、供应充足导致油价暴跌之后，欧佩克+接近就推迟石油增产计划达成一致。【原文：OPEC+ is close to agreement on delaying a planned increase in oil production after prices plunged amid fragile demand and plentiful supplies.】

item.title: 利比亚石油出口涓涓流出，即使当局阻止装货
item.description: 政治危机导致利比亚产量骤降，尽管出口受到限制，但石油仍在源源不断地从利比亚流出。【原文：Oil is still trickling out of Libya, despite restrictions on exports during a political crisis that has caused the country’s output to plunge.】

item.title: 美国数据支持对美联储减息的押注，日元对美元汇率攀升 1
item.description: 在一份经济报告显示美国劳动力市场脆弱，从而推动美联储降息之后，日元兑美元汇率飙升超过1%。【原文：Japan’s yen surged more than 1% against the dollar after an economic report showed fragility in the US labor market, boosting the case for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 劳动力数据疲软助推美联储减息押注，美国收益率曲线出现倒挂
item.description: 美国两年期国债收益率自 2022 年以来仅第二次跌破 10 年期国债收益率，原因是就业数据弱于预期，支持了对美联储大幅降息的押注。【原文：The US two-year note’s yield fell below the 10-year note’s for only the second time since 2022 as weaker-than-anticipated job openings data bolstered wagers on steep interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 利比亚接近达成中央银行协议，但障碍依然存在
item.description: 利比亚对立的政治派别就任命央行行长的路线图达成一致，这是朝着缓解导致这个欧佩克国家大部分石油停产的僵局迈出的试探性一步。【原文：Libya’s rival political factions agreed to a road map to appoint a central bank governor, a tentative step toward easing a deadlock that’s led to the halt of much of the OPEC nation’s oil production.】

item.title: 博斯蒂克称美联储就业和通胀目标面临的风险已趋于平衡
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）表示，自2021年以来，该央行的两项任务--稳定物价和最大就业率--首次实现了平衡，但他补充说，他 "还没有准备好 "宣布战胜通胀。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said the central bank’s two mandates — stable prices and maximum employment — are now in balance for the first time since 2021, though he added he is “not quite prepared” to declare victory over inflation.】

item.title: 医疗补助观点令市场失望，Centene 大跌
item.description: Centene Corp. 的股价创下一年来最大跌幅，此前该保险公司发布的医疗补助计划成员预测令投资者失望。【原文：Centene Corp. shares fell the most in a year after the insurer released a projection for members in its Medicaid program that disappointed investors.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率下调至 4.25%，未来将采取更多宽松政策
item.description: 加拿大央行连续第三次降息四分之一个百分点，并重申如果通胀继续放缓，"合理 "地预期会有更多宽松政策出台。【原文：The Bank of Canada cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point for a third consecutive meeting, and reiterated that it’s “reasonable” to expect more easing to come if inflation keeps decelerating.】

item.title: 西班牙推选何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦部长领导中央银行
item.description: 西班牙政府部长何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）被选为该国央行行长，及时参与了欧元区下周可能做出的降息决定。【原文：Spanish government minister Jose Luis Escriva was selected as the country’s central bank chief, in time to partake in the euro zone’s likely decision next week to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 德意志银行按需增加杠杆贷款风险转移额度
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在投资者的强烈要求下，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）将重大风险转移的规模扩大了 10 亿美元。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG bolstered the size of a significant risk transfer by $1 billion after strong investor demand, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
